Content:
{  "schemaVersion": "2.2",  "description": "Scans Filesystem for Log4J Prints to stdout",  "mainSteps": [    {      "inputs": {        "runCommand": [          "touch log4j_jars
 find / -iname "*log4j-core*.jar" 2>/dev/null > log4j_jars
 if [ ! -s log4j_jars ]; then echo "nolog4jcore" > log4j_jars ; fi 
 TOKEN=`curl -s -X PUT "http://169.254.169.254/latest/api/token" -H "X-aws-ec2-metadata-token-ttl-seconds: 21600" 2>/dev/null`
 AccId=`curl -s -H "X-aws-ec2-metadata-token: $TOKEN" -v http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/identity-credentials/ec2/info/ 2>/dev/null | grep -i "AccountId" | awk '{print $3}' | tr -d \" | tr -d , | head -n 1`
 InstId=`curl -s -H "X-aws-ec2-metadata-token: $TOKEN" -v http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id 2>/dev/null`
 Hostnme=`uname -n`
 Region=`curl -s -H "X-aws-ec2-metadata-token: $TOKEN" -v http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/placement/availability-zone 2>/dev/null`
 RunDate=`date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M+00:00`
 awk -v iHostnme="$Hostnme" -v iRunDate="$RunDate" -v iAccId="$AccId" -v iInstId="$InstId" -v iRegion="$Region" '{print iRunDate "	" iAccId "	" iRegion "	" iInstId "	" iHostnme "	" $1} ' log4j_jars
 rm log4j_jars"        ]      },      "name": "log4jFileSystemQuery",      "action": "aws:runShellScript",      "precondition": {        "StringEquals": [          "platformType",          "Linux"        ]      }    }  ]}
Name: arn:aws:ssm:us-west-2:488481995235:document/LinuxLog4JFileScan
